Elements

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Counters

Counters display numbers with a description.
123,456,789
Downloads 
<div class="counter">
    <div class="value">
        123,456,789
    </div>
    <div class="desc">
        Downloads
    </div>
</div>
Downloads
123,456,789 
<div class="counter">
    <div class="desc">
        Downloads
    </div>
    <div class="value">
        123,456,789
    </div>
</div>

Sizes

Counters can be resized.
123,456,789
Large 
<div class="counter large">
    <div class="value">
        123,456,789
    </div>
    <div class="desc">
        Large
    </div>
</div>
123,456,789
Medium 
<div class="counter medium">
    <div class="value">
        123,456,789
    </div>
    <div class="desc">
        Medium
    </div>
</div>
123,456,789
Default 
<div class="counter">
    <div class="value">
        123,456,789
    </div>
    <div class="desc">
        Default
    </div>
</div>
123,456,789
Small 
<div class="counter small">
    <div class="value">
        123,456,789
    </div>
    <div class="desc">
        Small
    </div>
</div>
